info.name: Thiago
info.education: Digital Games, Instituto de Educação Superior de Brasília - IESB

projects.title: Reddit Clone
projects.description: Travel smarter by saving the places you want to go. This project was an assignment given for an interview. The requirements were to build a web-app that calls the Google Places API. It must include a map with pins and a list of locations, with some interactivity between the two.
